channel.title: Trading problem
channel.description:
I have a problem when trading another player on my server. You literally cant accept the trade. you're stuck on the first screen and you have to press decline or exit out. it doesn't let you press accept. Nothing happens when you press accept.
(erasedPkz source)
any help would be appreciated. (please explain it in a beginner way please) <- lol

item.title: Trading problem
item.dc:creator: @zackary zackary
item.description:
@zackary wrote:

What .java is the trade code in?

Read full topic

item.title: Trading problem
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I had the similar problem, looks like the guy who touched trade didn’t have a clue what he was doing. Because of the messy code I didn’t want to really touch it but if you replace trade with one from a blank PI (with everything fixed ofc) it should fix your problem. (lol cheap fixes). You can always try doing closeInterface() or whatever it is in PI.

Read full topic
